statements: SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_type, cryptocurrency, purchase_amount FROM transactions WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, sale_date, purchase_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, sale_amount FROM transactions WHERE cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 AND sale_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin' AND purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, purchase_amount FROM transactions WHERE sale_amount >= 500 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND sale_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_purchase_amount, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE cryptocurrency='Bitcoin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, cryptocurrency, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='Buy' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN users ON transactions.transaction_id = users.user_id WHERE transaction_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, cryptocurrency, amount FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, price FROM transactions WHERE cryptocurrency='Bitcoin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, market_price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_price > 1000 ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, cryptocurrency FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 AND cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate < 1.0;
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC, wallet_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.currency_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN currencies c ON t.currency = c.currency_name WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;

SELECT u.username, w.balance, c.currency_name FROM users u INNER JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id INNER JOIN currencies c ON w.currency_id = c.currency_id WHERE w.balance > 5000 ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, cryptocurrency_name, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY cryptocurrency_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY cryptocurrency_name
SELECT users.username, wallets.balance FROM users JOIN wallets ON users.user_id = wallets.user_id ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transactions_history WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, cryptocurrency_name, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, balance, last_transaction_date FROM wallets WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_information WHERE current_price BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
